extDescription.message: Ekobakisa na ndenge automatique ba attachements ya e‑mail ya liboso na biyano.

optionsTitle.message: Kokutana na ba‑attachements — Makambo ya kobongisa

uiNoOptions.message: Sik’oyo ezali na eloko te ya kobongisa.

uiSupport.message: Olingi extension oyo? Sunga ngai na mwa donation moke:

uiGithubText.message: Po na rapport ya ba erreurs to mituna mosusu, tala

uiBlacklistHeader.message: Liste noire ya kombo ya fichier (ba modèles glob)

uiBlacklistHelp.message: Ba fichiers oyo kombo na bango ekokokana na moko ya ba modèles oyo, ekozala te automatique kolongama. Modèle moko na ligne moko. Bato: *.png, smime.*, *.p7s

uiWarnBlacklistLabel.message: Loba soki ba‑attachements elongolami na liste noire

uiConfirmHelp.message: Dialogue moke ya kondima emonana kaka soki tozali kobakisa nsolo ya koba‑attachements solo. Clavier: Y to J = Ee; N to Esc = Te.

warnBlacklistIntro.message: Ba fichier oyo elandi ekobakisama te na automatique:
